author: Stephen Alpher
title: Fold Holdings Slumps 7% on Delay in Bitcoin Rewards Credit Card
description: The stock has lost more than 50% of its value since coming public earlier this year in a SPAC deal.
content:
Fold Holdings (FLD) notified customers early Monday afternoon of a delay in the rollout of its Fold Bitcoin Credit Card.
Shares quickly slumped more than 7% on the news.
